/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a high vantage point, providing a bird's eye view of the scene below. The street, lined with lush green trees, stretches out into the distance, flanked by buildings on both sides. A few people can be seen strolling along the sidewalk, adding a touch of life to the urban landscape. The sky above is a clear blue, and the sun shines brightly, casting a warm glow over the entire scene.
